sections.PURPOSE: this operation is to enable UAF to reclaim territory through combined arms fires and maneuver.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Integrate IDF at echelon 60, 120, 155mm into the MNVR planning process
UAS used to detect enemy and observe fires
Co CDRs understand Triggers for Co/BTG targets
UAF understands echelonment of fires
Obscure enemy obstacles
Secure and jump MFPs
sections.END STATE:
UAF can effectively employ and synchronize fires at echelon in their maneuver operations to enable seizure of complex objectives.
